title: Richard Ramsey, PhD
text: I am a Senior Scientist at ETH Zurich. My research interests span a range of topics in social and cognitive neuroscience, and my lab embraces recent developments in methods and meta-science. I co-direct the Social Brain in Action Laboratory (SoBA Lab).

title: About
text: Over the last 5 years or so, I’ve become increasingly concerned about the state of research in psychology and human neuroscience. To address some of the issues that hinder research quality, my lab has been wholeheartedly embracing recent advances in methods development and meta-science approaches. See the …. page for more details…

title: SoBA Lab
text:
I co-direct the Social Brain in Action Laboratory (SoBA Lab) with Emily Cross.
You can find all the news and views from the SoBA lab here

title: Testing a blog
text:
Why am I writing a blog?
Two reasons. 1) Lab manual (of sorts). Save time re-saying things to SoBA-lab people, so it is efficient. 2) Open science. Why not make stuff open? Then other folks can benefit and I can benefit from feedback.


What will I blog about?

Reproducibility.
Meta-science.
My love of David Bowie.
